unnormalised: Delhivery's new hub at 12/4 Mathura Road, Faridabad, Haryana, PIN 121003 is facing some teething problems, bhai. Seems like a few parcels are getting misrouted. My parcel, destined for 10 MG Road, Bangalore, 560001, went to Jaipur first!
normalised: Delhivery's new hub at twelve slash four Mathura Road, Faridabad, Haryana, P-I-N one hundred and twenty one thousand and three is facing some teething problems, bhai. Seems like a few parcels are getting misrouted. My parcel, destined for ten M-G Road, Bangalore, five hundred and sixty thousand and one, went to Jaipur first!

unnormalised: A source inside Delhivery, address withheld for obvious reasons, mentioned that the recent address format updates might be the culprit. They're working on a fix ASAP, aiming for complete normalization by 15/11/2024. Apparently, the old database structure at their Gurgaon HQ, DLF Phase 5, 122002, isn't syncing properly with the new system.
normalised: A source inside Delhivery, address withheld for obvious reasons, mentioned that the recent address format updates might be the culprit. They're working on a fix A-S-A-P, aiming for complete normalization by fifteenth november two thousand and twenty four. Apparently, the old database structure at their Gurgaon H-Q, D-L-F Phase five, one hundred and twenty two thousand and two, isn't syncing properly with the new system.

unnormalised: "We understand the inconvenience," said Ms. Sharma, Head of Operations (address inquiries to support@delhivery.com). "We are implementing a dual address verification system, comparing the PIN code (e.g., 400001 for Mumbai) with the street address for accuracy. Expect improvements by next week."
normalised: "We understand the inconvenience," said M-s. Sharma, Head of Operations (address inquiries to support at delhivery dot com). "We are implementing a dual address verification system, comparing the P-I-N code (e.g., four hundred thousand and one for Mumbai) with the street address for accuracy. Expect improvements by next week."

unnormalised: Meanwhile, if your package seems lost, contact their customer care quoting your tracking ID and delivery address including building no. and sector, (e.g., Flat 2B, Sector 44, Noida, UP, 201301). Hopefully, they'll sort it out soon!
normalised: Meanwhile, if your package seems lost, contact their customer care quoting your tracking I-D and delivery address including building no. and sector, (e.g., Flat two B, Sector forty four, Noida, U-P, two hundred and one thousand three hundred and one). Hopefully, they'll sort it out soon!
